original: Peṭakopadesa
analyzed: peṭaka upadesa

original: Pakiṇṇakaniddesa
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka niddesa

original: Jhānaṁ virāgo.
analyzed: jhānam virāgaḥ

original: Cattāri jhānāni vitthārena kātabbāni.
analyzed: cattāri jhānāni vitthārena kātabbāni

original: Tāni duvidhāni;
analyzed: tāni duvidhāni

original: bojjhaṅgavippayuttāni ca bojjhaṅgasampayuttāni ca.
analyzed: bojjhaṅga vippayuttāni ca bojjhaṅga sampayuttāni ca

original: Tattha bojjhaṅgavippayuttāni bāhirakāni, bojjhaṅgasampayuttāni ariyapuggalāni.
analyzed: tattha bojjhaṅga vippayuttāni bāhirakāni bojjhaṅga sampayuttāni ariya puggalāni

original: Tattha yena cha puggalamūlāni tesaṁ nikkhipetvā rāgacarito, dosacarito, mohacarito,
analyzed: tattha yena cha puggala mūlāni tesam nikkhipetvā rāga caritaḥ dosa caritaḥ moha caritaḥ

original: rāgadosacarito, rāgamohacarito, dosamohacarito, samabhāgacarito, iti imesaṁ puggalānaṁ
analyzed: rāga dosa caritaḥ rāga moha caritaḥ dosa moha caritaḥ sama bhāga caritaḥ iti imesam puggalāna

original: jhānaṁ samāpajjitānaṁ pañca nīvaraṇāni paṭipakkho tesaṁ paṭighātāya yathā asamattho
analyzed: jhānam samāpajjitānam pañca nīvaraṇāni paṭipakkhaḥ tesam paṭighātāya yathā asamatthaḥ

original: tīṇi akusalamūlāni niggaṇhāti.
analyzed: tīṇi akusala mūlāni niggaṇhāti

original: Lobhena akusalamūlena abhijjhā ca uddhaccañca uppilavataṁ alobhena kusalamūlena niggaṇhāti, kukkuccañca vicikicchā ca mohapakkho, taṁ amohena niggaṇhāti.
analyzed: lobhena akusala mūlena abhijjhā ca uddhaccam ca uppilavatam alobhena kusala mūlena niggaṇhāti kukkuccam ca vicikicchā ca moha pakkhaḥ tam amohena niggaṇhāti

original: Doso ca thinamiddhañca dosapakkho, taṁ adosena niggaṇhāti.
analyzed: doso ca thinam iddham ca dosa pakkhaḥ tam adosena niggaṇhāti

original: Tattha alobhassa pāripūriyā nekkhammavitakkaṁ vitakketi.
analyzed: tattha alobhassa pāripūriyā nekkhamma vitakkam vitakketi

original: Tattha adosassa pāripūriyā abyāpādavitakkaṁ vitakketi.
analyzed: tattha a dosassa pāripūriyai a byāpāda vitakkam vitakketi

original: Tattha amohassa pāripūriyā avihiṁsāvitakkaṁ vitakketi.
analyzed: tattha amohassa pāripūriyai a vihisā vitakkam vitakketi

original: Tattha alobhassa pāripūriyā vivitto hoti kāmehi.
analyzed: tattha alobhassa pāripūriyā vivittaḥ hoti kāmehi

original: Tattha adosassa pāripūriyā amohassa pāripūriyā ca vivitto hoti pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi, savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: tattha adosassa pāripūriyā amohassa pāripūriyā ca vivittaḥ hoti pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Vitakkāti tayo vitakkā—
analyzed: vitakkā ati tayaḥ vitakkā

original: nekkhammavitakko abyāpādavitakko avihiṁsāvitakko.
analyzed: nekkhamma vitakko a byāpāda vitakko a vihisā vitakko

original: Tattha paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko, paṭiladdhassa vicaraṇaṁ vicāro.
analyzed: tattha paṭhama abhinipātaḥ vitakko paṭiladdhassa vicaraṇam vicāro

original: Yathā puriso dūrato purisaṁ passati āgacchantaṁ, na ca tāva jānāti eso itthīti vā
analyzed: yathā purisaḥ dūratas purisam passati āgacchanta na ca tāva jānāti eso itthī iti vā

original: purisoti vā yadā tu paṭilabhati itthīti vā purisoti vā evaṁ vaṇṇoti vā evaṁ saṇṭhānoti
analyzed: puriso ti vā yadā tu paṭilabhati itthī iti vā purisaḥ iti vā evam vaṇṇo ti vā evam

original: vā ime vitakkayanto uttari upaparikkhanti kiṁ nu kho ayaṁ sīlavā udāhu dussīlo aḍḍho vā duggatoti vā.
analyzed: vā ime vitakkayantaḥ uttari upaparikkhanti kim nu kho ayam sīlavā udāhu dussīlaḥ aḍḍhaḥ vā duggataḥ iti vā

original: Evaṁ vicāro vitakke appeti, vicāro cariyati ca anuvattati ca.
analyzed: evam vicāraḥ vitakke appeti vicāro cariyati ca anuvattati ca

original: Yathā pakkhī pubbaṁ āyūhati pacchā nāyūhati yathā āyūhanā evaṁ vitakko, yathā pakkhānaṁ pasāraṇaṁ evaṁ vicāro anupālati vitakketi vicarati vicāreti.
analyzed: yathā pakkhī pubbam āyūhati pacchā na āyūhati yathā āyūhanā evam vitakkaḥ yathā pakkhānam pasāraṇam evam vicāraḥ anupālati vitakketi vicarati vicāreti

original: Vitakkayati vitakketi, anuvicarati vicāreti.
analyzed: vitakkayati vitakketi anuvicarati vicāreti

original: Kāmasaññāya paṭipakkho vitakko, byāpādasaññāya vihiṁsasaññāya ca paṭipakkho vicāro.
analyzed: kāma saññāya paṭipakkhaḥ vitakkaḥ byāpāda saññāya vihisa saññāya ca paṭipakkhaḥ vicāraḥ

original: Vitakkānaṁ kammaṁ akusalassa amanasikāro, vicārānaṁ kammaṁ jeṭṭhānaṁ saṁvāraṇā.
analyzed: vitakkānam kammam akusalassa amanasikāraḥ vicārānam kammam jeṭṭhānam sa vāraṇā

original: Yathā paliko tuṇhiko sajjhāyaṁ karoti evaṁ vitakko, yathā taṁyeva anupassati evaṁ vicāro.
analyzed: yathā palikaḥ tuṇhikaḥ sajjhāyam karoti evam vitakkaḥ yathā tayā iva anupassati evam vicāraḥ

original: Yathā apariññā evaṁ vitakko.
analyzed: yathā apariññā evam vitakkaḥ

original: Yathā pariññā evaṁ vicāro.
analyzed: yathā pariññā evam vicāraḥ

original: Niruttipaṭisambhidāyañca paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāyañca vitakko, dhammapaṭisambhidāyañca atthapaṭisambhidāyañca vicāro.
analyzed: nirutti paṭisambhidāyañca paṭibhāna paṭisambhidāyañca vitakkaḥ dhamma paṭisambhidāyañca attha paṭisambhidāyañca vicāraḥ

original: Kallitā kosallattaṁ cittassa vitakko, abhinīhārakosallaṁ cittassa vicāro.
analyzed: kallitā kosallattam cittassa vitakkaḥ abhinīhāra kosallam cittassa vicāro

original: Idaṁ kusalaṁ idaṁ akusalaṁ idaṁ bhāvetabbaṁ idaṁ pahātabbaṁ idaṁ sacchikātabbanti vitakko, yathā pahānañca bhāvanā ca sacchikiriyā ca evaṁ vicāro.
analyzed: idam kusalam idam akusalam idam bhāvetabbam idam pahātabbam idam sacchikātabbanti vitakkaḥ yathā pahānam ca bhāvanā ca sacchikiriyā ca evam vicāraḥ

original: Imesu vitakkavicāresu ṭhitassa duvidhaṁ dukkhaṁ na uppajjati kāyikañca cetasikañca;
analyzed: imesu vitakka vicāresu ṭhitassa duvidham dukkham na uppajjati kāyikam ca cetasikam ca

original: duvidhaṁ sukhaṁ uppajjati kāyikañca cetasikañca.
analyzed: duvidham sukham uppajjati kāyikam ca cetasikam ca

original: Iti vitakkajanitaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ pīti kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ kāyikoyeva.
analyzed: iti vitakka janitam cetasikam sukham pīti kāyikam sukham

original: Yā tattha cittassa ekaggatā, ayaṁ samādhi.
analyzed: yā tattha cittassa ekagga tā ayam samādhi

original: Iti paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ pañcaṅgavippahīnaṁ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṁ.
analyzed: iti paṭhamam jhānam pañcaṅga vippahīnam pañcaṅga samannāgata

original: Tesaṁyeva vitakkavicārānaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ āsevanāya tassa tappoṇamānasaṁ hoti.
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam abhikkhaṇam āsevanāya tassa tat poṇa mānasam hoti

original: Tassa vitakkavicārā oḷārikā khāyanti.
analyzed: tassa vitakka vicārā oḷārikā khāyanti

original: Yañca pītisukhañca nekkhammañca oḷārikaṁ bhavati.
analyzed: yat ca pīti sukham ca nekkhammañca oḷārikam bhavati

original: Api ca samādhijā pīti rati ca jāyati.
analyzed: api ca samādhi jā pīti rati ca jāyati

original: Tassa vicārārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: tassa vicāra ārammaṇa

original: Tesaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ ceto sampasīdati.
analyzed: tesam vūpasamā ajjhattam cetaḥ sampasīdati

original: Ye vitakkavicārā dve dhammānussaritabbā.
analyzed: ye vitakka vicārā dve dhamma anussaritabbā

original: Paccuppannā daraṇitabbaṁ.
analyzed: paccuppannā

original: Tesaṁ vūpasamā ekodibhāvaṁ cittekaggataṁ hoti.
analyzed: tesam vūpasamā ekodi bhāvam citta ekaggatam hoti

original: Tassa ekodibhāvena pīti pāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: tassa eka udi bhāvena pīti pāripūrim gacchati

original: Yā pīti, taṁ somanassindriyaṁ, yaṁ sukhaṁ, taṁ sukhindriyaṁ.
analyzed: yā tam somanassindriya yam tam sukhindriya

original: Yā cittekaggatā, ayaṁ samādhi.
analyzed: yā citta ekagga tā ayam samādhi

original: Taṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ caturaṅgasamannāgataṁ.
analyzed: tam dutiyam jhānam catur aṅga samannāgata

original: So pītiyā virāgā yāti ojahi jallasahagataṁ.
analyzed: saḥ

original: Tattha somanassacittamupādānanti ca so taṁ vicinanto upekkhameva manasikaroti.
analyzed: tattha somanassa cittam upādānanti ca saḥ tam vicinantaḥ upekkham eva manasikaroti

original: So pītiyā virāgā upekkhako viharati.
analyzed: so pītiyāḥ virāgāḥ upekkhakaḥ viharati

original: Yathā ca pītiyā sukhamānitaṁ, taṁ kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti sampajāno viharati.
analyzed: yathā ca tam kāyena paṭisaveda iti sampajānaḥ viharati

original: Yena satisampajaññena upekkhāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: yena sati sampajaññena upekkhā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Idaṁ tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ caturaṅgasamannāgataṁ.
analyzed: idam tatiyam jhānam catur aṅga samannāgata

original: Tathā kāyikassa sukhassa pahānāya paṭhame jhāne somanassindriyaṁ nirujjhati.
analyzed: tathā kāyikassa sukhassa pahānāya paṭhame jhāne somanassa indriyam nirujjhati

original: Dutiye jhāne dukkhindriyaṁ nirujjhati.
analyzed: dutiye jhāne dukkha indriyam nirujjhati

original: So sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: so sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbe va somanassa domanassānam atthaṅgamā adukkham asukham upekkhā sati pārisuddhim catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Tattha catūhi indriyehi upekkhā pasādā hoti, dukkhindriyena domanassindriyena sukhindriyena somanassindriyena ca.
analyzed: tattha catūhi indriyehi upekkhā pasādā hoti dukkhindriyena domanassindriyena sukhindriyena somanassindriyena ca

original: Tesaṁ nirodhā upekkhāsampajaññaṁ hoti, tattha sukhindriyena somanassindriyena ca
analyzed: tesam nirodhā upekkhā sampajaññam hoti tattha sukha indriyena somanassa indriyena ca

original: asati hoti, tesaṁ nirodhā satimā hoti, dukkhindriyena domanassindriyena ca asampajaññaṁ,
analyzed: asati hoti tesam nirodhā satimā hoti dukkha indriyena domanassa indriyena ca asampajañña

original: tesaṁ nirodhā sampajaññaṁ hoti, iti upekkhāya ca saññā, sato sampajāno cittekaggatā
analyzed: tesam nirodhā sampajaññam hoti iti upekkhāya ca saññā sataḥ sampajāno citta ekagga tā

original: ca idaṁ vuccate ca catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
analyzed: ca idam vuccate ca catuttham jhāna

original: Tattha yo rāgacarito puggalo tassa sukhindriyañca somanassindriyañca;
analyzed: tattha yaḥ rāga caritaḥ puggalo tassa sukha indriyañca somanassa indriyañca

original: yo dosacarito puggalo tassa dukkhindriyañca domanassindriyañca;
analyzed: yaḥ dosa caritaḥ puggalo tassa dukkha indriyañca domanassa indriyañca

original: yo mohacarito puggalo tassa asati ca asampajaññañca.
analyzed: yaḥ moha carito puggalo tassa asati ca asaṃpajaññam ca

original: Tattha rāgacaritassa puggalassa tatiye jhāne catutthe ca anunayo nirujjhati, dosacaritassa
analyzed: tattha rāga caritassa puggalassa tatiye jhāne catutthe ca anunayaḥ nirujjhati dosa caritassa

original: paṭhame jhāne dutiye ca paṭighaṁ nirujjhati, mohacaritassa puggalassa paṭhame jhāne
analyzed: paṭhame jhāne dutiye ca paṭigham nirujjhati moha caritassa puggalassa paṭhame jhāne

original: dutiye ca asampajaññaṁ nirujjhati.
analyzed: dutiye ca asampajaññam nirujjhati

original: Tatiye jhāne catutthe ca asati nirujjhati, evameva tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ cattāri jhānāni vodānaṁ gamissanti.
analyzed: tatiye jhāne catutthe ca asati nirujjhati evam eva tesam tiṇṇam puggalānam cattāri jhānāni vodānam gamissanti

original: Tattha rāgadosacaritassa puggalassa asampajaññañca anunayo ca paṭighañca, tena hānabhāgiyaṁ jhānaṁ hoti.
analyzed: tattha rāga dosa caritassa puggalassa asampajaññam ca anunayo ca paṭighañca tena hāna bhāgiyam jhānam hoti

original: Tattha rāgamohacaritassa puggalassa anunayattaṁ ca ādīnavaṁ dassitā, taṁ tassa hānabhāgiyaṁ jhānaṁ hoti.
analyzed: tattha rāga moha caritassa puggalassa ca ādīnavam dassitā tam tassa hāna bhāgiyam jhānam hoti

original: Tattha dosamohacaritassa puggalassa paṭigho ca asati ca asampajaññañca ādīnavaṁ dassitā tena tassa hānabhāgiyaṁ jhānaṁ hoti.
analyzed: tattha dosa moha caritassa puggalassa paṭighaḥ ca asati ca asampajaññam ca ādīnavam dassitā tena tassa hāna bhāgiyam jhānam hoti

original: Tattha rāgadosamohasamabhāgacaritassa puggalassa visesabhāgiyaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, imāni cattāri jhānāni sattasu puggalesu niddisitabbāni.
analyzed: tattha rāga dosa moha sama bhāga caritassa puggalassa visesa bhāgiyam jhānam hoti imāni cattāri jhānāni sattasu puggalesu niddisitabbāni

original: Catūsu ca samādhīsu chandasamādhinā paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ, vīriyasamādhinā dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, cittasamādhinā tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ, vīmaṁsāsamādhinā catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
analyzed: catūsu ca samādhīsu chanda samādhinā paṭhamam jhāna vīriya samādhinā dutiyam jhāna citta samādhinā tatiyam jhāna vīmasā samādhinā catuttham jhāna

original: Appaṇihitena paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ, suññatāya dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, animittena tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ, ānāpānassatiyā catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
analyzed: appaṇihitena paṭhamam jhāna suññatāya dutiyam jhāna animittena tatiyam jhāna āna apāna satiyā catuttham jhāna

original: Kāmavitakkabyāpādānañca taṁ taṁ vūpasamena paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, vitakkavicārānaṁ
analyzed: kāma vitakka byāpādānam ca tam tam vūpasamena paṭhamam jhānam

original: vūpasamena dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, sukhindriyasomanassindriyānaṁ vūpasamena tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ,
analyzed: vūpasamena dutiyam jhāna sukha indriya somanassa indriyānam vūpasamena tatiyam jhāna

original: kāyasaṅkhārānaṁ vūpasamena catutthaṁ jhānañca.
analyzed: vūpasamena catuttham jhānam ca

original: Cāgādhiṭṭhānena paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ, saccādhiṭṭhānena dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, paññādhiṭṭhānena tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ, upasamādhiṭṭhānena catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
analyzed: cāga adhiṭṭhānena paṭhamam jhāna sacca adhiṭṭhānena dutiyam jhāna paññā adhiṭṭhānena tatiyam jhāna upasamā dhiṭṭhānena catuttham jhāna

original: Imāni cattāri jhānāni saṅkhepaniddesena niddiṭṭhāni, tattha samādhindriyaṁ pāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: imāni cattāri jhānāni saṅkhepa niddesena niddiṭṭhāni tattha samādhi indriyam pāripūrim gacchati

original: Anuvattanakāni cattāri, tattha yo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ nissāya āsavakkhayaṁ pāpuṇāti, so sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya domanassindriyapaṭipakkhena.
analyzed: anuvattanakāni cattāri tattha yaḥ paṭhamam jhānam nissāya āsava kkhayam pāpuṇāti so sukhāya paṭipadāya dandha abhiññāya domanassindriya paṭipakkhena

original: Yo dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ nissāya āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti, so sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya dukkhindriyapaṭipakkhena.
analyzed: yaḥ dutiyam jhānam nissāya āsavānam khayam pāpuṇāti so sukhāya paṭipadāya khippa abhiññāya dukkha indriya paṭipakkhena

original: Yo tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ nissāya āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti, so sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya somanassindriyapaṭipakkhena.
analyzed: yaḥ tatiyam jhānam nissāya āsavānam khayam pāpuṇāti so sukhāya paṭipadāya dandha abhiññāya somanassa indriya paṭipakkhena

original: Yo catutthaṁ jhānaṁ nissāya āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti, so sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya sukhindriyapaṭipakkhena gato.
analyzed: yaḥ catuttham jhānam nissāya āsavānam khayam pāpuṇāti so sukhāya paṭipadāya khippa abhiññāya sukha indriya paṭipakkhena gataḥ

original: Pakiṇṇakaniddeso.
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka niddeso
